title: Ticket #2480: consistent naming for user commands vs. machine commands.
description:
During our conversation from FW on 9/19/11 we discussed the lack of consistency of naming for some client tools, namely ones ending in _job.

We had discuss things like condor_vacate + _job

it makes more sense to have consistency: 

condor_vacate_job -> condor_vacate
condor_vacate -> condor_vacate -machine
creator: tstclair
